scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:workers
scripts.build:workers: cd workers && npm install && npm run build
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:workers
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:fix:frontend && npm run lint:fix:workers
scripts.format: prettier --write . && cd workers && npm run format
scripts.format:check: prettier --check . && cd workers && npm run format:check
scripts.type-check: tsc --noEmit && cd workers && npm run type-check
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd workers && npm install
